mapper.select: select from prj_collect a where a.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prj_collect(empid, prjid, money, time, remark) VALUES(#{ model.empid },#{ model.prjid },#{ model.money },#{ model.time },#{ model.remark })
mapper.select: select ,b.name empName,c.name prjName,d.name cusName from prj_collect a left join man_emp b on a.empid=b.id left join prj_project c on a.prjid=c.id left join cus_customer d on c.customrid = d.id WHERE a.empid=#{empid} AND a.time>#{startTime} AND a.time <#{endTime} ORDER BY time DESC
